thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 9 of 3563
thread.title: Sandy

author: Sandy
title: Sandy
text: Was able to order a book for the fraction of the cost at Thrift Books. Thereafter I got in touch with Thrift Books when I was concerned about the book not arriving for a while. They got back with me fast and were reassuring and was going to look into the situation. Guess what! My book was in the mail that very day. They are concerned and would of done something to solve the hold up. Going to buy more books from them.
